Definition: Unique ID for each hospitalization encounter; used for ordering encounters.
Truncated encounter index indicating visit order, truncated to 5 to avoid sparse data at higher visit numbers.
Binary outcome: 1 = readmitted within 30 days; 0 = not readmitted within 30 days.
Collapsed race category: Caucasian, AfricanAmerican, or Other. Time-invariant.
Hemoglobin A1C measurement category (>8, >7, Norm, None). Time-varying glycemic control indicator.
Insulin prescription status during the encounter (Up/Down/Steady/No). Time-varying.
Whether diabetes medication was changed during the encounter ('Ch'/'No'). Time-varying.
Whether the patient was prescribed diabetes medication ('Yes'/'No'). Time-varying.
Number of medications administered during the encounter. Time-varying severity indicator.
Length of stay (days) for the encounter. Time-varying.
Number of emergency visits in the year prior to the encounter. Time-varying.
Number of inpatient visits in the year prior to the encounter. Time-varying.
Collapsed admission type: Emergency (1), Urgent (2), Elective (3), or Other (5). Time-varying acuity indicator.
